column1: #Text=High-quality polycrystalline samples of Ca3Ti2O7 and Ca2.15Sr0.85Ti2O7 were prepared using the standard solidstate synthesis method at 1300–1500 ◦C.

#Text=Stoichiometric amounts of CaCO3 (Alfa Aesar; 99.95%), SrCO3 (Alfa Aesar; 99.99%), and TiO2 (Alfa Aesar Puratronic; 99.995%) powders were well-mixed, ground, pelletized, and then heated for 30 h in air.
